author: Al Jazeera
title: Some African countries could hit coronavirus peak in weeks: WHO
description: UN health body urges African countries to urgently increase testing and warns the virus' peak is near.
content:
Some African countries could see a peak in coronavirus cases in the coming weeks, and testing should be urgently increased in the region, the World Health Organization (WHO) said.
"During the last four days, we can see that the numbers have already doubled,"… [+1667 chars]
